titles.title: CB 15 Hallelujah, For the Lord Our God

verse.name: v1
verse.lines:
HALLELUJAH, FOR THE LORD OUR GOD,
The Almighty, reigns. Hallelujah, for the Lord our
God, the Almighty, reigns. Let us rejoice and be
glad, and give the glory unto Him. Hallelujah, for
the Lord our God, the Almighty, reigns.
